paragraphs.content: Psalm 145
paragraphs.contentHtml: Psalm 145

paragraphs.content: David’s Psalm of praise.
paragraphs.contentHtml: David’s Psalm of praise.

paragraphs.content: I will extol thee, my God, O king; and I will bless thy name for ever and ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will extol thee, my God, O king; and I will bless thy name for ever and ever.

paragraphs.content: Every day will I bless thee; and I will praise thy name for ever and ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Every day will I bless thee; and I will praise thy name for ever and ever.

paragraphs.content: Great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised; and his greatness is unsearchable.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Great is the Lord, and greatly to be praised; and his greatness is unsearchable.

paragraphs.content: One generation shall praise thy works to another, and shall declare thy mighty acts.
paragraphs.contentHtml: One generation shall praise thy works to another, and shall declare thy mighty acts.

paragraphs.content: I will speak of the glorious honour of thy majesty, and of thy wondrous works.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will speak of the glorious honour of thy majesty, and of thy wondrous works.

paragraphs.content: And men shall speak of the might of thy terrible acts: and I will declare thy greatness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And men shall speak of the might of thy terrible acts: and I will declare thy greatness.

paragraphs.content: They shall abundantly utter the memory of thy great goodness, and shall sing of thy righteousness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They shall abundantly utter the memory of thy great goodness, and shall sing of thy righteousness.

paragraphs.content: The LORD is gracious, and full of compassion; slow to anger, and of great mercy.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord is gracious, and full of compassion; slow to anger, and of great mercy.

paragraphs.content: The LORD is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.

paragraphs.content: All thy works shall praise thee, O LORD; and thy saints shall bless thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: All thy works shall praise thee, O Lord; and thy saints shall bless thee.

paragraphs.content: They shall speak of the glory of thy kingdom, and talk of thy power;
paragraphs.contentHtml: They shall speak of the glory of thy kingdom, and talk of thy power;

paragraphs.content: To make known to the sons of men his mighty acts, and the glorious majesty of his kingdom.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To make known to the sons of men his mighty acts, and the glorious majesty of his kingdom.

paragraphs.content: Thy kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, and thy dominion endureth throughout all generations.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thy kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, and thy dominion endureth throughout all generations.

paragraphs.content: The LORD upholdeth all that fall, and raiseth up all those that be bowed down.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord upholdeth all that fall, and raiseth up all those that be bowed down.

paragraphs.content: The eyes of all wait upon thee; and thou givest them their meat in due season.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The eyes of all wait upon thee; and thou givest them their meat in due season.

paragraphs.content: Thou openest thine hand, and satisfiest the desire of every living thing.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou openest thine hand, and satisfiest the desire of every living thing.

paragraphs.content: The LORD is righteous in all his ways, and holy in all his works.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord is righteous in all his ways, and holy in all his works.

paragraphs.content: The LORD is nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord is nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth.

paragraphs.content: He will fulfil the desire of them that fear him: he also will hear their cry, and will save them.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He will fulfil the desire of them that fear him: he also will hear their cry, and will save them.

paragraphs.content: The LORD preserveth all them that love him: but all the wicked will he destroy.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord preserveth all them that love him: but all the wicked will he destroy.

paragraphs.content: My mouth shall speak the praise of the LORD: and let all flesh bless his holy name for ever and ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My mouth shall speak the praise of the Lord: and let all flesh bless his holy name for ever and ever.
